West Germany's Cancer Research Center said today that most of some 150 beers it tested contain traces of a cancer-causing substance nitrosamine no American beers were tested but us Brewers are conducting their own tests and suspect the results will be similar the researchers say however that this substance can be eliminated from the beer through new Brewing methods
